languages.text: "{g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Дети Азуриана{/g} не вступают в сражения, которые не могут выиграть. Однако в наших силах направлять потоки, чтобы стихия сама смывала с пути преграды и врагов. Так стало и в этот раз: Муаран, провидец Крудараха, узрел будущее без {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}мон-кай{/g}, и повел нас за собой. Мы лишь использовали страсти мон-кай против них самих. Страсть к свободе и анархии. Страсть к владычеству и насилию. Столкнуть слуг с правителями проще, если те, между кем ты развязываешь вражду, служат эмоциям, а не разуму".

traits.locale_text: "Дети Асурьян не вступают в сражения, которые не могут выиграть. Однако в наших силах направлять потоки, чтобы стихия сама смывала с нашего пути преграды и врагов. Так стало и в этот раз: Муаран, провидец Крудараха, узрел будущее без мон-кай, и повел нас за собой. Мы лишь использовали страсти мон-кай против них самих. Страсть к свободе и анархии. Страсть к владычеству и насилию. Столкнуть слуг с правителями проще, если те, между кем ты развязываешь вражду, служат эмоциям, а не разуму".

languages.text: "The {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Asuryani{/g} do not enter battles they cannot win. However, it is in our power to direct the currents so that the elements themselves wash obstacles and enemies from our path. And so it was in this case — Muaran, the Farseer from Crudarach, saw a future without the {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g}, and we followed his lead. We simply used the mon-keigh's passions against them. Their love of freedom and anarchy. Their love of domination and violence. Stoking enmity between servants and rulers is easier when your targets are governed by emotion rather than reason."
languages.original_text: "{g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Дети Азуриана{/g} не вступают в сражения, которые не могут выиграть. Однако в наших силах направлять потоки, чтобы стихия сама смывала с пути преграды и врагов. Так стало и в этот раз: Муаран, провидец Крудараха, узрел будущее без {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}мон-кай{/g}, и повел нас за собой. Мы лишь использовали страсти мон-кай против них самих. Страсть к свободе и анархии. Страсть к владычеству и насилию. Столкнуть слуг с правителями проще, если те, между кем ты развязываешь вражду, служат эмоциям, а не разуму".

traits.locale_text: "The Asuryani do not enter battles they cannot win. However, it is in our power to direct the currents so that the elements themselves wash obstacles and enemies from our path. And so it was in this case — Muaran, the farseer from Crudarach, saw a future without the mon-keigh, and we followed his lead. We simply used the mon-keigh's passions against them. Their love of freedom and anarchy. Their love of domination and violence. Stoking enmity between servants and rulers is easier when your targets are governed by emotion rather than reason."

Their love of freedom and anarchy. Their love of domination and violence. Stoking enmity between servants and rulers is easier when your targets are governed by emotion rather than reason."

Stoking enmity between servants and rulers is easier when your targets are governed by emotion rather than reason."

languages.text: 「{g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}アシュリヤーニ{/g}は勝てない戦をしない。しかしながら、元素そのものを操って障害物と敵を道から除けるように、川の流れを変えるのが我らの力。そしてこの場合は…クルダラの先見司ムアランが見た未来に{g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}モン＝ケイ{/g}はいなかった。我らはムアランの先導に従う。我らはモン＝ケイが自身の支配者に逆らう情熱を利用するだけだ。自由と混乱への愛を。支配と暴力への愛を。理性をはるかに上回る感情で目標を支配してやれば、従者と支配者との間で憎悪を蓄えるのは容易いものだ」
languages.original_text: "The {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Asuryani{/g} do not enter battles they cannot win. However, it is in our power to direct the currents so that the elements themselves wash obstacles and enemies from our path. And so it was in this case — Muaran, the Farseer from Crudarach, saw a future without the {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g}, and we followed his lead. We simply used the mon-keigh's passions against them. Their love of freedom and anarchy. Their love of domination and violence. Stoking enmity between servants and rulers is easier when your targets are governed by emotion rather than reason."

traits.locale_text: 「{g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}アシュリヤーニ{/g}は勝てない戦をしない。しかしながら、元素そのものを操って障害物と敵を道から除けるように、川の流れを変えるのが我らの力。そしてこの場合は…クルダラの先見司ムアランが見た未来に{g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}モン＝ケイ{/g}はいなかった。我らはムアランの先導に従う。我らはモン＝ケイが自身の支配者に逆らう情熱を利用するだけだ。自由と混乱への愛を。支配と暴力への愛を。理性をはるかに上回る感情で目標を支配してやれば、従者と支配者との間で憎悪を蓄えるのは容易いものだ」

languages.text: “{g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}方舟灵族{/g}不会参加没有胜算的战斗。我们拥有引导世间万物的力量，让那些事物本身摧垮我们前进道路上的障碍和敌人，这次也同样是如此。来自克鲁达拉赫的先知穆兰认为我们的未来不需要{g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}猴子{/g}，而我们也追随着他的脚步。我们只是单纯地利用猴子们的激情来对付他们，利用他们对自由与无政府主义的热爱，利用他们对统治与暴力的狂热。如果你的目标不受理智支配，做事全凭情感，那么想要煽动统治者与臣民之间的敌意，不过是件易如反掌的事情。”
languages.original_text: "The {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Asuryani{/g} do not enter battles they cannot win. However, it is in our power to direct the currents so that the elements themselves wash obstacles and enemies from our path. And so it was in this case — Muaran, the Farseer from Crudarach, saw a future without the {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g}, and we followed his lead. We simply used the mon-keigh's passions against them. Their love of freedom and anarchy. Their love of domination and violence. Stoking enmity between servants and rulers is easier when your targets are governed by emotion rather than reason."

traits.locale_text: “{g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}方舟灵族{/g}不会参加没有胜算的战斗。我们拥有引导世间万物的力量，让那些事物本身摧垮我们前进道路上的障碍和敌人，这次也同样是如此。来自克鲁达拉赫的先知穆兰认为我们的未来不需要{g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}猴子{/g}，而我们也追随着他的脚步。我们只是单纯地利用猴子们的激情来对付他们，利用他们对自由与无政府主义的热爱，利用他们对统治与暴力的狂热。如果你的目标不受理智支配，做事全凭情感，那么想要煽动统治者与臣民之间的敌意，不过是件易如反掌的事情。”

languages.text: «Los {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Asuryani{/g} no libran batallas que no puedan ganar. No obstante, está en nuestro poder guiar las corrientes de forma que los elementos aparten obstáculos y enemigos de nuestro camino. Y eso fue lo que ocurrió aquí: Muaran, el vidente de Crudarach, predijo un futuro sin los {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g}, y el resto le seguimos. Nos limitamos a usar las pasiones de los mon-keigh en su contra. Su querencia de libertad y anarquía. Su amor por la dominación y la violencia. Es fácil sembrar cizaña entre siervos y soberanos cuando tus víctimas se dejan gobernar por las emociones en lugar de la razón».
languages.original_text: "The {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Asuryani{/g} do not enter battles they cannot win. However, it is in our power to direct the currents so that the elements themselves wash obstacles and enemies from our path. And so it was in this case — Muaran, the Farseer from Crudarach, saw a future without the {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g}, and we followed his lead. We simply used the mon-keigh's passions against them. Their love of freedom and anarchy. Their love of domination and violence. Stoking enmity between servants and rulers is easier when your targets are governed by emotion rather than reason."

traits.locale_text: «Los {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Asuryani{/g} no libran batallas que no puedan ganar. No obstante, está en nuestro poder guiar las corrientes de forma que los elementos aparten obstáculos y enemigos de nuestro camino. Y eso fue lo que ocurrió aquí: Muaran, el vidente de Crudarach, predijo un futuro sin los {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g}, y el resto le seguimos. Nos limitamos a usar las pasiones de los mon-keigh en su contra. Su querencia de libertad y anarquía. Su amor por la dominación y la violencia. Es fácil sembrar cizaña entre siervos y soberanos cuando tus víctimas se dejan gobernar por las emociones en lugar de la razón».

languages.text: "Die {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Asuryani{/g} stürzen sich nicht in Schlachten, die sie nicht gewinnen können. Allerdings liegt es in unserer Macht, die Strömungen so zu beeinflussen, dass die Elemente selbst Hindernisse und Feinde aus unserem Weg wegspülen. So war es auch in diesem Fall – Muaran, der Runenprophet von Crudarach, sah eine Zukunft ohne {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}Chem-Pan-Sey{/g}, und wir folgten ihm. Wir haben ganz einfach die Leidenschaften der Chem-Pan-Sey gegen sie eingesetzt. Ihre Liebe zu Freiheit und Anarchie. Ihre Liebe zu Beherrschung und Gewalt. Feindseligkeit zwischen Dienern und Herrschern zu säen, ist einfacher, wenn Eure Ziele von Gefühlen statt von Vernunft geleitet werden."
languages.original_text: "The {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Asuryani{/g} do not enter battles they cannot win. However, it is in our power to direct the currents so that the elements themselves wash obstacles and enemies from our path. And so it was in this case — Muaran, the Farseer from Crudarach, saw a future without the {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g}, and we followed his lead. We simply used the mon-keigh's passions against them. Their love of freedom and anarchy. Their love of domination and violence. Stoking enmity between servants and rulers is easier when your targets are governed by emotion rather than reason."

So war es auch in diesem Fall – Muaran, der Runenprophet von Crudarach, sah eine Zukunft ohne {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}Chem-Pan-Sey{/g}, und wir folgten ihm. Wir haben ganz einfach die Leidenschaften der Chem-Pan-Sey gegen sie eingesetzt. Ihre Liebe zu Freiheit und Anarchie. Ihre Liebe zu Beherrschung und Gewalt. Feindseligkeit zwischen Dienern und Herrschern zu säen, ist einfacher, wenn Eure Ziele von Gefühlen statt von Vernunft geleitet werden."

languages.text: « Les {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Asuryanis{/g} ne s'engagent dans un combat que s'ils sont sûrs de l'emporter. Cela dit, nous avons le pouvoir de contrôler les courants de façon à ce que les éléments balaient les obstacles et les adversaires sur notre chemin. Dans ce cas précis, Muaran, le Grand Prophète de Crudarach, avait aperçu un avenir sans les {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g} ; nous l'avons donc suivi. Il nous aura suffi de retourner leurs passions contre eux : leur soif de liberté et d'anarchie, de domination et de violence... Il est bien plus simple d'attiser les flammes de la rancune entre serviteurs et dirigeants lorsque vos cibles sont mues par l'émotion plutôt que la raison. »
languages.original_text: "The {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Asuryani{/g} do not enter battles they cannot win. However, it is in our power to direct the currents so that the elements themselves wash obstacles and enemies from our path. And so it was in this case — Muaran, the Farseer from Crudarach, saw a future without the {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g}, and we followed his lead. We simply used the mon-keigh's passions against them. Their love of freedom and anarchy. Their love of domination and violence. Stoking enmity between servants and rulers is easier when your targets are governed by emotion rather than reason."

Dans ce cas précis, Muaran, le Grand Prophète de Crudarach, avait aperçu un avenir sans les {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g} ; nous l'avons donc suivi. Il nous aura suffi de retourner leurs passions contre eux : leur soif de liberté et d'anarchie, de domination et de violence... Il est bien plus simple d'attiser les flammes de la rancune entre serviteurs et dirigeants lorsque vos cibles sont mues par l'émotion plutôt que la raison. »

languages.text: "{g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Asuryaniler{/g}, kazanamayacakları savaşa girmez. Lakin cereyan eden olayları yönlendirmek suretiyle, piyonların engelleri ve düşmanları yolumuzdan kaldırmasını sağlamaya kadiriz. Bu sefer de öyle oldu. Crudarachlı Ötesezen Muaran, {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh'sız{/g} bir gelecek gördü; biz de onun izinden gittik. Mon-keighın tutkularını, özgürlük ve anarşi aşkını, tahakküm ve zorbalık sevdalarını kullandık o kadar. Hizmetkârlar ile hükümdarlar arasındaki husumeti körüklemek, kurbanlarınız aklı yerine kalbine kulak veriyorsa daha kolay olur."
languages.original_text: "The {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Asuryani{/g} do not enter battles they cannot win. However, it is in our power to direct the currents so that the elements themselves wash obstacles and enemies from our path. And so it was in this case — Muaran, the Farseer from Crudarach, saw a future without the {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g}, and we followed his lead. We simply used the mon-keigh's passions against them. Their love of freedom and anarchy. Their love of domination and violence. Stoking enmity between servants and rulers is easier when your targets are governed by emotion rather than reason."
